That is something that you've seen many times
moves.5... dxc4: Not a very good move giving a tempo to white bishop
moves.6. Bxc4 cxd4 7. Nxd4 Nb4:
The first thing in the opening is to develop your pieces...
White have 3 developed and Black - only the Knight on b4
moves.8. O-O Nf6 9. Qb3 a5: Black is behind in development. It is not a time to catch a queen
moves.10. Rd1 Bd7 11. a4 e5: Final mistake. 11... Rc8 seems much better
moves.12... Ke7 13. Nf5+ Bxf5 14. Rxd8 Rxd8 15: Preparing Bc1-e3, but game finished in other way
